answers.answer: Hi there,Cramps in toes can be experienced due to any problem in your leg circulation or nerve supply. The common possibilities are muscle fatigue or stress, vitamin D deficiency, diabetes, any injury or trauma, pinched nerve, etc.These are only a few possibilities. For more queries and assistance you are suggested to contact an orthopaedician and get tested. Treatment will depend on the cause.Best luck and kind regards!

question: Why do I get cramp in my toes? It is very painful and my foot stiffens like wood. This mostly happens when I am lying down.
title: Cramp in Toes
